description: Install and Configure hadoop and hbase.

db/backup/lineage.description: The prefix that will be used to name/locate the backup of hbase. Note: For servers running on Rackspace, this value also indicates the Cloud Files container to use for storing primary backups. If a Cloud Files container with this name does not already exist, the setup process creates one.

hadoop/terminate_safety.description: Prevents the accidental running of the db::do_teminate_server recipe. This recipe will only run if this input variable is overridden and set to "off".
hadoop/terminate_safety.default: Override the dropdown and set to "off" to really run this recipe
choice: Override the dropdown and set to "off" to really run this recipe

recipes.hadoop::do_hadoop_init: Creates new block device and formats the node
recipes.hadoop::do_delete_volumes_and_terminate_: Deletes any currently attached volumes from the instance and then terminates the machine.
